contentencoded:
This final note today, a bit out of the ordinary, but it gives you a nice sense of what journalists think of on a slow news Friday.

We got to wondering around here this morning if you had a public radio Hunger Games, who would win?

On Twitter, @T_Cronin said today he'd love to see Terry Gross versus Ira Glass. Lourdes Garcia Navarro got lots of love, too.

Tweet us your answers @MarketplaceAPM and @KaiRyssdal, or comment below. Here are some we received already:
teaser: A thought for a Friday: If you had a public radio Hunger Games, who would win?
title: Kai Ryssdal vs. Garrison Keillor: The public radio Hunger Games
description: A thought for a Friday: If you had a public radio Hunger Games, who would win?
